Игра действительно неплохая. Радует различие игрового процесса маньяка от выжевшего, есть разнообразие.  Но, в игре есть очень много багов, которые нуждаются в исправлении. 
Отвечу на вопрос типа: "Ира умерает". Я не соглашусь с этим мнением. Дело не в игре а в её игроках, популярность данной игры завсисит только от преобразовний разроботчика.

黎明杀机 这是一款不恐怖丶不平衡丶不友好的游戏，但这恰恰是我们推荐它的关键，真实丶人性丶垃圾偷电贼，气我老迈无力骗我耍猴戏，变态老农夫，月黑风高夜砍我几条街，神经病制作组，看BUG不改 天天瞎搞折腾人，而在游戏里，你能看见到死守钩子的无耻之徒，同舟共济一起死的感人队友，往死里就怼你一人的变态对手，和撇下你独自逃生的王八蛋，这是一个直面本性的游戏，他的精髓远远大过于普通竞技丶团队配合丶阵营撕逼，夹杂着各种慌的要死和捉弄戏谑，再加上中国玩家的大量涌入，对此我们还能说什么呢，这个新时代的开心农场，玩的我好气哦！！！

Pros:
Unique Co-op PVP 
Interesting level design
Interesting characters design/ Gameplay for Killers
Good leveling system
Good for private matches and playing with friends

Cons:
Bad game for solo play
No in-ingame VOIP
Extremely imbalanced
Easily exploitable game mechanics
DLC killers outright broken compared to vanilla killers


When I picked up this game, I had very little idea what I was getting into.  I had seen a few youtube videos on it and that was about it.  For the first 10 hours the game really delivered on the whole killer vs. survivors horror mechanic.  However, soon after I found out that this game just became another half thought out game.  This is because if you want to actually want to enjoy this game, all people in the lobby have to "roleplay" a bit.  Most times what survivors can do to win is just ghost the killer around and block him from doing anything with little to no penalty as the killer has to manage 4 people at the same time.  Even though the game is heavily focused in the killer's favor, all survivors have to do is cheese the game to win.  How do you cheese the game you ask?  Here is how:

Follow right behind the Killer
Block the killer from putting people on the hook (the way you kill survivors) by standing in front of them.
Stunning or blinding the killer while they are stuck in an uncancelable animation
Playing "ring-around-the-rosie" with the killer (actually a valid tactic in certain situations, but most times just irritating as hell)

And that is just to name a few.  The most undeniable flaw of this game is the fact that as a survivor, there is no way to communicate with the other survivors via VOIP or typing while in a match.  The best you get are two "emotes" that has your character either POINT or WAVE.  This opens up the SUPER OBVIOUS GAME EXPLOIT of using third party voice communications (teamspeak, discord, skype, etc.) to party up with friends and properly coordinate against the killer.  Which sounds simple, but in this game, a super coordinated survivor team can make playing this game nearly impossible even for a well skilled killer.  This is the MAIN REASON why I cannot reccomend buying this game UNLESS you buy with friends and play together.  Playing as the killer, which I thought would be the coolest part of the game, is really no fun when you realize they are not as powerful or scary as you once perceived them to be.  That doesn't even touch the obviously overpowered DLC characters that make this game nearly impossible for a coordinated team (let alone a team of randoms).  The obvious examples are the Doctor and the Nightmare (Freddy Krueger).

So, to recap, if you solo play a lot do not buy this game.  Only buy if you have a group of friends to play with.  Game mechanics are interesting but mostly broken.
Hella good

Update:
I've added about 1k more hours since my original review. This game gives you new chapters (dlc), regular updates that address player complaints, constant improvement of balancing, and other in-game mechanics. Kudos to the developers for adding new content and giving players an incentive to play with the Rift system and the challenges web. The game is constantly changing with map updates, perk updates, item updates, and more. The Devs take the time to listen to player feedback and not fall into any salty player complaints and traps.

This game is fun and your performance is rewarded with more challenging players to play with and against.

Original Review: 
I love this game. It scary and the atmosphere sometimes just gets to you. Its fun and there's nothing more thrilling than winning a match. It has its flaws though. There's issues with balancing of every aspect, from point balancing, to character balancing- this game is always updating and coming up with patches in response to player criticisms and demands (to some degree). It has every issue any multiplayer game has considering that winning is dependent on your teamates making smart choices and not putting you in an easily defeatable position or D/C early.  

I think its worth purchasing and playing. Especially with friends!

O jogo é bom, o que mata ele é a comunidade tóxica, campers (justificavel se não pegou ninguém até o final do jogo) e o desbalanceamento pesado em favor dos sobreviventes.

Resumindo, os sobreviventes tem muitos perks de "segundas chances" pra escapar do killer ou tornar a vida deles mais fácil enquanto os killers sempre são nerfados e tem uma desvantagem notável em map design por causa de pallet looping.

Não acredita em mim? Veja os vídeos do tru3talent na twitch, ele é um dos melhores killers do jogo e dá pra ver a dificuldade que o cara tem jogando contra SWF (Survive with Friends). Era pros sobreviventes terem medo do killer, mas é o Killer que tem medo dos sobreviventes nesse ponto.

Bem, tirando essas partes ruins, o jogo é bom. Tem vários killers e sobreviventes disponiveis pra jogar e tem um longo período de vida. Bem competitivo e divertido também. Tenso se você for mais impressionável do que o normal. 

As DLC's são baratas e estendem bastante a vida útil do jogo, recomendo fortemente.

A mi opinion es un gran juego por su modo de jugabilidad en el cual no solo tienes que reparar 5 motoros o mas conosidos como generadores lo cuales se encuentran en distintas partes de los diferentes mapas que hay con sus diferentes asesinos que te iran jodiendo.

En resumen: Es tan putamente bueno que me e visiado tanto con el juego que ya tengo 118 horas jugadas para quien lo lea y se quiere comprar el juego, asme caso esta bueno al principio no lo entenderas mucho pero con el tiempo te acostumbras

Grasias por leer mi comentario del el juego.

Pros:
- Als 4er Premate Team zu gewinnen ist sehr einfach
- Vielzahl an Skills / Fähigkeiten / Killer
- Gute Anzahl an Karten
- Nix für schwache Nerven, gruselig ist es ab und zu, vorallem Nachts xD

Cons:
- Als Killer gegen ein 4er Premate Team zu gewinnen ist fast unmöglich
- Hartes Lootsystem, was du mitbringst verlierst du wenn du stirbst
- Ohne ein 5.1 oder besseres Headset ist es schwer auszumachen wo jemand ist
- Dritte Person ist echt unfair dem Killer gegenüber...

这款游戏其实对所有人都非常友好，所有同类PVP游戏不会套路不认路被套路个几十回几百次都是正常的，每个人都有自己喜欢的套路，被人摁在地上打被守尸被板子砸都是自己实力不济而已，赖不着别人。（我这种零技能新屠还曾经团灭过一队人皇）
有汉化，画质不赖，已经很良心了，而且还在国内玩家的投稿下推出了以杨永信为原型的医生，我是没见过这么抱中国爸爸大腿的游戏公司（虽然也推出了payday这种一百多个DLC的狗东西）
游戏氛围渲染的很不错，有美国八十年代经典恐怖片和虐杀片的感觉，就是心理素质不好的有时候当屠夫还会被吓一跳。

玩这款游戏要保持平和的心态，人被追了就撒丫子跑找无敌房或者翻窗户，屠夫一路追着你不一定是恨你只是为了分数而已；屠夫被板子砸了被闪瞎狗眼了钩子被拆了也不是对面多想搞你只是为了刷血点。游戏嘛，娱乐最重要，不赢房子不赢地的。

MP hra, kde se postavíte do role jednoho z ikonických vrahů nebo se "postavíte" proti vrahovi jako jeden ze skupiny přeživších. DbD se muže zdát, že jde o repetivní hru, kde stále děláte to samé do kola... schováváte se, snažíte se opravit generátory aby jste měli šťávu pro otevření bran, kterými pak můžete utéct vrahovi, kterého nejste schopni, stejně jako zabijáky v hororech 80 let, nikaj zabít... a nebo furt dokola zabíjíte nebohé přeživší co se vám vloudili na zahradu. ANO... je to stejně repetivní jako třeba Dota. Pořád to samé i když to nikdy není to samé. Každá z her je unikátní, protože samotný game play ovlivňují jak schopnosti jednotlivých hráčů, tak i perky a vybavení, které si sebou berete/ či najdete v mapě. I přes zdánlivý dojem, že furt děláte to samé je hra stále zábavná a pokud máte kamarády s kterými můžete hrát (věřím že i bez nich), tak se jedná dle mě o skvělou zábavu na mnoho hodin.
